title: Sold T206 Ed Walsh Piedmont 350 PSA 2

posts.post_title: Sold T206 Ed Walsh Piedmont 350 PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Nice collector grade card, crease along the top that does not detract from the image.  "I'll take it" supersedes negotiations.  Please PM with any questions and thanks for looking.  $Sold pp/ff includes priority shipping.
